origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'TaxAPI.analyze_tax_burden', 'description': 'This function analyzes the tax burden and potential optimization areas for a company based on historical records.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'records', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The historical tax filing records of the company.'}, {'name': 'optimizationScope', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The scope of optimization, e.g., corporate, individual.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'analysis', 'description': 'The analysis report on tax burden and optimization opportunities.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 TaxAPI.analyze_tax_burden, 它的参数输入如下: 'records'是'historical_data', 'optimizationScope'是'corporate'.
